titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to establish a new method for fixing rates of basic pay for administrative appeals judges, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

bill.summary: 11/1/1999--Introduced. Requires each Federal agency to fix the rate of basic pay for each administrative appeals judge position within such agency which is not classified above GS-15 at: (1) not less than the minimum rate of basic pay for level AL-3; and (2) not greater than the maximum rate of basic pay for such level.
